data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pešić, Vladimir, Valdecasas, Antonio G., García-Jimenez, Ricardo (2012): Simultaneous evidence for a new species of Torrenticola Piersig, 1896 (Acari, Hydrachnidia) from Montenegro. Zootaxa 3515: 38-50, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.282580
